PMC:ReportSelectionTable
Enter Transit No. or (ALL) Text PPDField01 1 7 R Enter a Valid Transit # or (ALL)
Enter Transit Type (FROM) or (TO) DropDown PPDField02 1 4 R Enter (FROM) for transfer out or (TO) for transfer in. H FROM,TO FROM,TO
Enter Division No. or (ALL) Text PPDField03 1 3 R Enter a valid division # or (ALL)
Enter Starting Period (YYYYPP) or (ALL) Text PPDField04 1 6 R Enter a valid period (YYYYPP)
Enter Ending Period (YYYYPP) or (ALL) Text PPDField05 1 6 R Enter a valid period (YYYYPP)
Enter Starting Date or (ALL) DropDown PPDField06 6 8 R Enter a starting date in the form (MM/DD/YY) or (ALL) H ALL ALL
Enter Ending Date or (ALL) DropDown PPDField07 6 8 R Enter an ending date (MM/DD/YY) or (ALL) H ALL ALL
